Short Biography

I am currently a PhD student at City University in HongKong with Prof. Qingfu Zhang. Before that, I received the B.S. degrees in Engineering from Shenzhen University (SZU) in 2016. During 2016 to 2017, I was a Research Assistant at Shenzhen University with Dr. Qiuzhen Lin.

Research Interest

Computational Intelligence, Evolutionary Computation, Multi-Objective Optimization, Machine Learning

Work Experience

  • 2016 Jul ~ 2017 Sep
    • Research Assistant

    • with Dr. Qiuzhen Lin.
